### Create() {#a2200cefdf51f62605459b2f2cdfccfa1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>UnaryOperator &#42; UnaryOperator::Create (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#af9f57a32b08304fea642871735717f24">UnaryOps</a> Op, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; S, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Name=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertposition">InsertPosition</a> InsertBefore=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Construct a unary instruction, given the opcode and an operand.

Optionally (if InstBefore is specified) insert the instruction into a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> right before the specified instruction. The specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> is allowed to be a dereferenced end iterator.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h/#l00118">118</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h">InstrTypes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l02536">2536</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
